member.name: IWbemStatusCodeText.GetErrorCodeText
member.summary: TheIWbemStatusCodeText.GetErrorCodeTextmethod returns the text string description associated with the error code.
member.param: Handle to the error code for which you want a description.
Pointer to a string containing the descriptive text of the error code.
member.returns: This method returns WBEM_S_NO_ERROR if successful.

member.name: IWbemStatusCodeText.GetFacilityCodeText
member.summary: TheIWbemStatusCodeText.GetFacilityCodeTextmethod returns the name of the subsystem where the error occurred, such as "Windows", "WBEM", "SSPI", or "RPC".
member.param: Handle to the error code for which you want a description.
Pointer to a string containing the descriptive text of the error code.
member.returns: This method returns WMI_S_NO_ERROR if successful.

member.name: IWbemStatusCodeText
member.summary: TheIWbemStatusCodeText interface extracts text string descriptions of error codes or the name of the subsystem where the error occurred.
